programme.desc: You Only Move Twice: Homer is offered a new job by mysterious businessman Hank Scorpio. But will Marge, Bart and Lisa be happy in their idyllic new home town?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Homer They Fall: Homer becomes a boxer, thanks to his abnormally hard head. But is his skull strong enough for a fight against heavyweight champion Drederick Tatum?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Apu: When Apu loses the Kwik-E-Mart, he moves in with the Simpsons. And then Homer joins him on a pilgrimage to the first ever Kwik-E-Mart, in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: On the Christmas box: Michael McIntyre's Christmas Wheel, First Dates at Christmas, Strictly the Real Full Monty, Love Actually, World's Strongest Man, Elves, and No Time to Die.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: This time on the 'Box: Eurovision Song Contest, Bridgerton, Love Triangle Australia, Double the Money, Marcus Wareing Simply Provence and BBC News (northern lights).

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'Box: Bridgerton, Britain's Got Talent, Inside No. 9, My Strange Addiction: Still Addicted?, Top of the Pops 1984 and The War on Britain's Motorists: Dispatches

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Student Leah's on her first ever date. Cheeky welder Daniel and student midwife Emily bond over their shared passion for romcoms. Pilot Antonia meets rugby player Pete.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Will sausage roll maker Joel's culinary creativity impress recipe developer Mimi? And how will model Laura react when she finds out what tall, dark Dan does for a living?

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: On the Christmas box: Michael McIntyre's Christmas Wheel, First Dates at Christmas, Strictly the Real Full Monty, Love Actually, World's Strongest Man, Elves, and No Time to Die.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Bella Luna: Gordon visits Italian family restaurant Bella Luna, which is struggling with an inexperienced chef and an owner who won't acknowledge the eatery's flaws.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Revisit: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he's helped: La Galleria 33 in Boston; The Olde Hitching Post in Massachusetts; and the Prohibition Grille in Washington.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Frankie opens up about her past. Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens step in to help new mum Cleo. And Mercedes and Ste find themselves on a path of self-destruction...

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister that features a variety of cats doing strange things, some soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Peter's: Gordon visits Peter's Italian Restaurant in New York, where the peace of Long Island is shattered by the antics of the volatile Pellegrino family who run the place.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Mixing Bowl: Bijou New York diner The Mixing Bowl is haemorrhaging money thanks to manager Mike's out of control marketing plans. Can Gordon get things back on track?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Seascape: Gordon Ramsay visits the Seascape restaurant in the seaside village of Islip, on Long Island in New York, where owner Peter has nearly a million dollars of debt.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Secret Garden: Gordon Ramsay visits a romantic French restaurant in California, where temperamental chef Michel Bardavid's complicated cuisine is keeping the customers away.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Middle Earth Paradigm: Penny's Halloween party puts Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj through a demanding new test of their social skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Geology Elevation: Sheldon can't contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague, Bert the geologist, has won a prestigious fellowship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Property Division Collision: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny attempt to divide up all their possessions. It doesn't go well.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Birthday Synchronicity: Sheldon and Amy try to celebrate her birthday with an intimate night at home but are interrupted when Bernadette goes into labour.

programme.title: The Great Festive Bake Off
programme.desc: More merry bakers from Bake Off past - Benjamina, Rav, Rob and Sandy - join Paul, Prue, Noel and Sandi for a winter-wonderland-themed challenge. (Ep2/2)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Holiday Summation: After spending Christmas apart, the gang gather at Penny and Leonard's flat and hear about Sheldon and Amy's terrible trip to Texas.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Romance Recalibration: Penny thinks that Leonard has stopped making an effort in their relationship, so she decides to go away for a spa weekend with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Emotion Detection Automation: Sheldon tests a new invention after hearing that it could help him to read people's emotions. Raj seeks dating advice.

programme.title: The Simpsons Celebrity D'OHverload
programme.desc: The Springfield Files: Guest starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson and Leonard Nimoy. Homer thinks he's seen an alien. This could be a case for Mulder and Scully.

programme.title: The Simpsons Celebrity D'OHverload
programme.desc: Insane Clown Poppy: Guest starring Drew Barrymore, Stephen King and John Updike. Homer and Bart take Lisa to a book fair, where Krusty meets his long-lost daughter.

programme.title: The Simpsons Celebrity D'OHverload
programme.desc: Tennis the Menace: Guest starring Serena and Venus Williams, Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras. Homer builds a tennis court in the back garden but Bart's skills annoy him.

programme.title: The Simpsons Celebrity D'OHverload
programme.desc: Moonshine River: Guest starring Zooey Deschanel, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Anne Hathaway and Natalie Portman. The family travel to New York looking for Bart's long-lost love.

programme.title: The Simpsons Celebrity D'OHverload
programme.desc: Marge Gamer: Guest starring Brazilian football legend Ronaldo. Marge gets hooked on an online fantasy game and battles Bart. Lisa gets frustrated playing soccer.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers have been watching The Crown, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, You Won't Believe This, Down to Earth with Zac Efron, and The Hidden Lives of Pets.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the box this time, The Traitors, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, Michael McIntyre's The Wheel, Planet Sex with Cara Delevingne and You Won't Believe This.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: After dating a few love rats, beautician Gemma wants to find her Prince Charming. Tattoo artist Jennafer is fed up with men and is looking for the perfect woman.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Tattooed yoga lover Jak, vibrant 70-year-old fashion stylist Christine and Stetson-wearing Simon from Dallas are among the diners looking for love.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Man of the House: Erica's graduation is eclipsed by excitement about the new baby. Adam and Barry fight for the title of 'man of the house' in Murray's absence.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Uncle-ing: Erica asks Geoff to take her on a 'babymoon' to get her far away from Beverly. But then Erica's water breaks and she goes into labour...

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Frankie opens up about her past. Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens step in to help new mum Cleo. And Mercedes and Ste find themselves on a path of self-destruction...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens help new mum Cleo as she finally gets the support she needs. The Osbornes get to know Frankie's new beau. Gemma tries to build bridges with Mercedes.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes and Ste find themselves on a path of self-destruction while the McQueens support Sienna - but drama soon follows...

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lela's: In California, Gordon Ramsay visits Lela's, a fine dining restaurant run by inexperienced owner Lela and young chef Ricky. Can Gordon save them from complete disaster?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Circle of Driving: First episode of the US comedy about 11-year-old Adam documenting his life in 1980s suburbia with his parents' video camera. Barry wants driving lessons.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day: A day out with Erica at the roller-skating rink leaves Murray wishing that he hadn't asked his daughter to confide in him about her life.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: From Russia Without Love: Bart orders a Russian bride for Moe. She turns Moe's life around, and he falls in love.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Daddicus Finch: Lisa reads To Kill a Mockingbird and begins to observe wonderful similarities between Homer and Atticus Finch.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hot Tub Contamination: Leonard and Penny intervene when Sheldon and Amy have an argument. Howard and Bernadette are disturbed by unexpected guests.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fetal Kick Catalyst: Penny meets her fans at a comic book convention. Sheldon and Amy host brunch at Penny's flat. Howard makes an impulsive purchase.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Queer Eyes, Full Hearts: Phil and Claire don't know if they should be happy that Haley and Andy are spending time together. They soon find out that things are not as they appear.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Three Turkeys: Phil is cooking Thanksgiving dinner this year with Luke as his sous chef. But Claire has no confidence in them and prepares a secret turkey of her own as backup.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bozeman Reaction: After Leonard and Sheldon's flat is burgled, the gang create a new state-of-the-art security system to outwit any thieves and protect the place.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Einstein Approximation: Sheldon is baffled by a formula he's working on, so he gets a less mentally taxing job at the Cheesecake Factory to kick-start his creativity.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Large Hadron Collision: Sheldon is gutted when Leonard asks Penny to go to Switzerland on Valentine's Day to see the world's largest particle accelerator instead of him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Excelsior Acquisition: Sheldon is summoned to court for driving through a red light. He misses the chance to meet Stan Lee and riles the judge. Will he go to prison?

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho, and Tony Danza: Sheldon is busy obsessing over the status of Meemaw's budding relationship with his mentor, Dr John Sturgis.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Vanilla Ice Cream, Gentlemen Callers, and a Dinette Set: When Meemaw is pursued by two gentlemen callers and decides to date them both, Sheldon interferes.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Girl's in the Band: Lisa joins an advanced youth orchestra in Capital City, while Homer works the night shift and nearly goes mad.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I'm Just a Girl Who Can't Say D'oh: Marge directs a musical, but her leading man walks out and a thunderstorm threatens the live production...

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis: Amy realises that she has romantic feelings for Zack. Raj and Howard compete to prove who would make the better superhero.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Justice League Recombination: The guys slowly warm to Zack and find an enjoyable way to bond with him when they enter a New Year's Eve fancy dress competition together.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bus Pants Utilization: Leonard and Sheldon fight for control of an idea for an app.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Love Car Displacement: Howard feels threatened when Bernadette runs into her hulk of an ex-boyfriend at a science conference.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa vs. Malibu Stacey: Lisa decides Malibu Stacey dolls set a bad example to girls, so she pleads with their creator, Stacy Lovell (Kathleen Turner), to design an alternative.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Deep Space Homer: NASA recruit Homer and Barney to make the organisation more appealing to the common man. When Barney has too much to drink, Homer is chosen to go into space.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes and Ste spiral as loved ones step in to help. Donny's concerns over Dodger continue to grow. And there's turmoil for one family.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Springfield Files: Homer thinks he's seen an alien in the woods. This could be a case for Mulder and Scully (guest stars David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson).

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: Franca Sozzani: The final five arrive in Marrakech, where one model's upset about having to share a bed with two of her competitors, and there's a shoot involving camels.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: (2007) Nicolas Cage is Marvel's soul-hunting, hot-headed-biker antihero. When Mephistopheles's son starts causing trouble in hell, Ghost Rider is forced to sort it out. With Peter Fonda.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: (2020) Paul WS Anderson's sci-fi action starring Milla Jovovich, based on the game of the same name. A US Army Ranger must fight her way out of a parallel world full of monsters.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: (1959) Satirical comedy starring Peter Sellers (in a triple role) and the original Doctor Who, William Hartnell. The world's smallest state, Grand Fenwick, declares war on the USA.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure.

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: (1997) Comedy sequel starring Alex D. Linz as a resourceful boy who's stranded at home with chickenpox when a top-secret military microchip comes his way. Can he keep it safe from crooks?

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: (1992) Comedy starring Whoopi Goldberg. A casino singer who witnesses a Mob murder goes into hiding at a convent, where she soon has the choir rocking. With Maggie Smith.

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now
programme.desc: (1979) Final cut of Coppola's award-laden take on the Vietnam War, with Martin Sheen and Marlon Brando. An assassin travels upriver to terminate a renegade colonel with extreme prejudice.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: (2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: (1971) Film version of the popular comedy series set in 1940. The Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard, led by Arthur Lowe's Captain Mainwaring, bumble through a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: (1992) Family comedy. Macaulay Culkin ends up in a swish New York hotel while his family are in Miami. But the burglars he defeated before (Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern) are back...

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: (2022) Epic Viking saga starring Alexander Skarsgrd as a warrior prince who goes on the rampage to Iceland to avenge his murdered father. With Ethan Hawke, Nicole Kidman and Bjrk.

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: (2021) Comedy action starring Ryan Reynolds. Guy lives in Free City. Free City isn't real. Nor is Guy. It's all a big online game. Can he take down the corrupt game publisher?

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: (2021) Comedy horror with Milana Vayntrub. A park ranger is sent to a town where everyone is at each other's throats, figuratively at first, but then literally. Is a werewolf to blame?

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: (1948) Adaptation of Graham Greene's story with Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey. A butler who is accused of murdering his wife, has only a schoolboy to fight his corner.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: (2016) Action-comedy with Dwayne Johnson and Kevin Hart. Two former school buddies team up to thwart a terrorist plot. But things may not be as they seem. With Amy Ryan and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: (2022) A gang of violent home-invaders find out the hard way that you REALLY don't want to be on Santa's naughty list, in Tommy Wirkola's dark, violent Christmas comedy. With David Harbour.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: (2021) Action thriller with Bob Odenkirk. He's just a dad who goes to work and takes out the trash. But really he's an ex-assassin about to unleash his true self... and take out the trash.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: (2007) Nicolas Cage is Marvel's soul-hunting, hot-headed-biker antihero. When Mephistopheles's son starts causing trouble in hell, Ghost Rider is forced to sort it out. With Peter Fonda.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: (2020) Paul WS Anderson's sci-fi action starring Milla Jovovich, based on the game of the same name. A US Army Ranger must fight her way out of a parallel world full of monsters.

programme.title: Sister Act

programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now
programme.desc: (1979) Final cut of Coppola's award-laden take on the Vietnam War, with Martin Sheen and Marlon Brando. An assassin travels upriver to terminate a renegade colonel with extreme prejudice.
